articles.author: Devadyuti Das
articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: Pakistan On Collision Course With India, New PCB Chief Zaka Ashraf Rejects `Hybrid Model` - Zee News
articles.description: The likely new chairman of Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) Zaka Ashraf has rejected his predecessor Najam Sethi’s much-publicised ‘hybrid model’ for the upcoming Asia Cup 2023, which is slated to be held in Pakistan and Sri Lanka in September. “The first point i…
